title: azhaittadellAm
sahitya:
azhaittadellAm vINAgumO aDimaik-kabhayam tandAl karam nOgumO unnai


anupallavi

  vizhaindu nin urukkANa vENDit-tavamirundu kuzhaindu manam urgik-kuvalayam tannil nALum


caraNam    uyar tiru nAmam IrArumuraittEn peyarAyiram shollip-padamalar pUjittEn
 tuyar tIrttu bhava bandhattaip-pOkkiDum tAraka nAmamAna rAmA rAmA enru
